tool_description: Facilitates systematic collection and organization of assessment data from multiple sources using specified collection methods.

collection_methods.description: Methods for data collection to be used

target_sample_size.description: Desired number of responses or participants

collection_timeframe.description: Number of days allocated for data collection

data_quality_checks.description: Whether to implement data quality validation

error_messages: Invalid collection methods: Specify valid data collection approaches (surveys, interviews, observations, etc.).
Unrealistic sample size: Target sample size must be between 10 and 10000.
Insufficient timeframe: Collection timeframe must be at least 7 days.
Too many methods: Limit collection methods to 5 or fewer for manageable execution.
usage: Specify collection methods, target sample size, and timeframe. Optionally enable data quality checks. Tool provides structured approach for collecting and organizing assessment data.

collection_protocol.description: Step-by-step protocol for data collection activities

quality_metrics.description: Measures for assessing data quality and completeness

data_organization.description: Structure for organizing collected data for analysis
